name: You are Goo
description:
You are goo.
And all you need to do is get through the maze.
Sounds simple?
Perhaps not...

(I sincerely appologise for "whirlpool")

Controls:
Arrow keys: move the goo
Z/C/N: Grab Objects
X/V/M: (X) button prompts

Special thanks to a couple friends on discord for input (and leve 7)~
All code, music, graphics (and other levels) by me (sorry).
